title: React Portfolio
description: This is a project made to learn the latest languages by building an app.

title: Team Profile Generator
description: This GitHub repository houses a Node.js command-line application to generate team profile html file

title: Bootstrap Portfolio Website
description: A Responsive Portfolio using Html, Css and Bootstrap 5.

title: Random Password Generator
description: Random Password Generator can be used to generate a random password based on criteria selected by the User.

title: Timed Coding Quiz Game
description: A fun Coding Quiz game with multiple choice questions which uses localstorage to display results.

title: Daily Event Keeper
description: Simple calendar application that allows a user to save events for each hour of the day. Present/current hour block shows in red, future hour in green and Past hour is in grey.

title: 5 days Weather Dashboard
description: A weather app which displays the current and future(5 days) weather data through API.

title: Professional README Generator
description: A command-line application that dynamically generates a professional README.md from a user's input using the Inquirer package.
